plot: In The Desert, Aisha - the fortune teller, is sitting in her tent waiting for whoever their fate will lead them to her. They all go to her looking for answers, and whatever she tells them, it's gonna change their lives for ever.
title: The Smoked Mirror
plot_es: In The Desert, Aisha - the fortune teller, is sitting in her tent waiting for whoever their fate will lead them to her. They all go to her looking for answers, and whatever she tells them, it's gonna change their lives for ever.
plot_en: In The Desert, Aisha - the fortune teller, is sitting in her tent waiting for whoever their fate will lead them to her. They all go to her looking for answers, and whatever she tells them, it's gonna change their lives for ever.
